thread.title: Transport: Livestock, Freight, Fruit & Cardboard

title: Transport: Livestock, Freight, Fruit & Cardboard
text: Questions Business Summary This general freight delivery company located not far from Seattle, Washington, specializes in transporting freight, livestock, fruit and cardboard. They have a fleet of modern livestock trailers as well as flatbeds. The drivers have the experience to move sensitive loads and keep their clients investment dry and out of harm's way until it reaches the right loading dock and they stay in full and constant contact, so the customer always know where their shipment is. There are many transportation companies out there, but this business finds that they have to turn business away because of the demand, and because of this they are currently purchasing more equipment to meet that demand. This company has seen good growth in the last few years and are very diversified covering multiple needs for their clients. This business offers a new owner a successful company with stable revenues and good market growth. For more information on this listing with the price range of $250,000-$500,000, contact us today. This transport company has been in business since 2004 with the current ownership. After years of hard work and loyal customers standing true throughout the years, the current owners are ready to relocate to another area and see a new owner take it to the next level. This Washington based business for sale is a great opportunity to take a business that is already successful and build on that foundation to secure your future. This owner operated business is managed in a hands-on fashion giving the owner full controls over the quality of products and the customer service provided. Out of their total revenues, 40% comes from cattle transport, 39% from general freight delivery, and 21% from flatbed delivery such as fruit/cardboard. Semi trucks, flatbeds, cow trailers and equipment are included in the sale. More details are available upon request. 95% repeat clientele. This is a home based business, it can be operated from anywhere within the regional service area. Financials
